name: Maven TestNG Tests

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main
  schedule:
    - cron: '30 04 * * 1-5'

jobs:
  regression-test:
    runs-on: windows-latest
   
    steps:
    - name: Checkout code
      uses: actions/checkout@v2

    - name: Set up JDK
      uses: actions/setup-java@v2
      with:
        java-version: '11' 

    - name: Build and run tests
      run: |
        mvn clean test -DsuiteXmlFile=testng.xml
